text: Kuma wanda ya saye shi daga Masar* ya ce wa matarsa, "Ki girmama mazauninsa, akwai tsammanin ya amfane mu, ko kuwa mu riƙe shi ɗa."Kuma kamar wancan ne Muka tabbatar ga Yusufu, a cikin ƙasa kuma domin Mu sanar da shi daia fassarar luburu, kuma Allah ne Marinjayi a kan al'amarinSa, kuma amma mafi yawan mutane ba su sani ba
